product_name: Sierra Designs Microlight Pants - Men's Short - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The men's short Sierra Designs Microlight Pants provide wind protection and water resistance on or off the trail-and they pack up small in their own stuff sack. Polyester taffeta fabric with a durable water repellent finish offers ample water- and wind-resistance at a great value. Elastic drawcord waist personalizes the fit instantly. Seams are not sealed, but the Sierra Designs Microlight Pants offer water resistance in light rain for a short period of time. Closeout.
